comments.body: This will be a nice discussion on shifting the burden to the maintainer to help automated tools to parse licenses :grinning: (Spoilers here it will probably be useless.)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +35,39 @@    home: http://lxml.de/
    license: BSD 3-Clause, GPL-2.0, ZPL-2.0, and ElementTree
    license_file: LICENSES.txt
    summary: 'Pythonic binding for the C libraries libxml2 and libxslt.'
    description: |

comments.body:
@msarahan what is continuum policy for license family in a case like this?

Here, IMO, is one of those cases where only by reading the license one can truly known what **is** the license terms.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@about:
    home: http://lxml.de/
    license: BSD 3-Clause, GPL-2.0, ZPL-2.0, and ElementTree
    license_file: LICENSES.txt
    summary: 'Pythonic binding for the C libraries libxml2 and libxslt.'

comments.body:
I need this specific version for pycsw. See https://github.com/geopython/pycsw/pull/456
We can update it later to the latest release on the feedstock.
